item.title: Trump, Mamdani promise to work to help NYC and tackle affordability amid cordiality
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdan visited the White House Friday to meet with President Donald Trump for the first time.

item.title: Cruise ship death: Teen died by asphyxiation resulting from a bar hold, source says
item.description: The 18-year-old cheerleader from Titusville, Florida, was reported dead while aboard the Carnival Horizon cruise ship on Nov. 8.
